title: Pirsig's 2022 "On Quality" -  Jonathan Pageau at TBay  - Matthieu Pageau on JBP
description:
Some important things that are ongoing.

On Quality ordering link: https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/on-quality-robert-m-pirsig/1140045421

Matthieu Pageau on JBP: https://youtu.be/8R-vkbxX8r4

James Kourtides on JBP MP convo: https://youtu.be/hfSLL-JT71U

Pageau's talk, lets see how badly I butchered it haha!: https://youtu.be/A9qMuz9_zu0
